name: ITS FiSHING
description:
Ah, a nice relaxing fishing game. Except it's not.

Play as a government aircraft sent to investigate strange sightings of abnormally powerful and large fish. Take on as many as you can in arcade mode or play against your buddies in local multiplayer mode.

Controls:

Up key - Forward

Left/Right arrow key - turn

Space - Shoot

Check out my DEVLOGS to see what I'm up to.
